name: Shimura
description:
Hi, this is my first video game.  It won't be a great one but I hope that at least someone will enjoy it.  The objective of this project is get a good feedback of other gamers and be able to improve my skills.  I' ll be updating this page frequently.

Controls:

Left Arrow or A = Move to the left.

Right Arrow or D = Move to the right.

Up Arrow = Jump.

J = "Teleport".

R = Restart the game scene.

#In the next update I'll fix the problem with the only enemy(Neimish) in the game. For arrive to the "end" of this game version, you have to press "J" to avoid the Neimish.

News:

Right now the 0.1.3 version is released. This only contains the base idea of the art of the game and the beginning of the adventure that I hope this game be.
